GSD.product_version: versions from v4.16 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
mwifiex: fix sleep in atomic context bugs caused by dev_coredumpv

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit a78b882c1a9feda10821a25201a0464674f8209e, it was introduced in version v4.16 by commit f5ecd02a8b20f900701d6809a3ea5f12e5c87de8. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mwifiex: fix sleep in atomic context bugs caused by dev_coredumpv
